description: Update an existing user post feed post.

flags.description: Subscription start timestamp (ISO 8601, empty to clear).
flags.name: --subscription-start-at
flags.validation: ISO 8601 timestamp or empty to clear.

flags.description: Subscription end timestamp (ISO 8601, empty to clear).
flags.name: --subscription-end-at
flags.validation: ISO 8601 timestamp or empty to clear.

permissions: User must be an admin or the owner of the user_post_feed for the post.
side_effects: Updates user creator feed data and associated user creator feed creator records after save.
validation_notes: At least one updatable field must be provided; otherwise the command errors with "no fields to update". Subscription start/end timestamps accept ISO 8601 values or an empty string to clear.
